pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graphical Reporting for Clinical Trials // Contains many functions useful for monitoring and reporting the results of clinical trials and other experiments in which treatments are compared. LaTeX is used to typeset the resulting reports, recommended to be in the context of 'knitr'. The 'Hmisc', 'ggplot2', and 'lattice' packages are used by 'greport' for high-level graphics.
